verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to Shushan<WH7802> Eduth. A Mikhtam of David, to) (teach; when he struggled with Aram-naharaim and with Aram-zobah, and Joab) (returned, and smote twelve thousand of Edom in the Valley of Salt.) O God,<WH430> Thou hast rejected<WH2186> us. Thou hast broken<WH6555> us; Thou hast been<WH599> angry;<WH599> O, restore<WH7725> us.
Thou hast made the land<WH776> quake,<WH7493> Thou hast split<WH6480> it open;<WH6480> Heal<WH7495> its breaches,<WH7667> for it totters.<WH4131>
Thou hast made Thy people<WH5971> experience<WH7200> hardship;<WH7186> Thou hast given<WH8248> us wine<WH3196> to drink<WH8248> that makes us stagger.<WH8653>
Thou hast given<WH5414> a banner<WH5251> to those who fear<WH3372> Thee, That it may be displayed<WH5264> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the truth.<WH9534> Selah.<WH5542>
That Thy beloved<WH3039> may be delivered,<WH2502> Save<WH3467> with Thy right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> and answer<WH6030> us!
God<WH430> has spoken<WH1696> in His holiness:<WH6944> "I will exult,<WH5937> I will portion<WH2505> out Shechem<WH7927> and measure<WH4058> out the valley<WH6010> of Succoth.<WH5523>
"Gilead<WH1568> is Mine, and Manasseh<WH4519> is Mine; Ephraim<WH669> also is the helmet<WH4581> of My head;<WH7218> Judah<WH3063> is My scepter.<WH2710>
"Moab<WH4124> is My washbowl<WH7366>;<WH5518> Over<WH5921> Edom<WH9000> I shall throw<WH7993> My shoe;<WH5275> Shout<WH7321> loud,<WH7321> O Philistia,<WH6429> because<WH5921> of Me!"
Who<WH4310> will bring<WH2986> me into the besieged<WH4692> city<WH5892>? Who<WH4310> will lead<WH5148> me to Edom<WH9000>?
Hast not Thou Thyself,<WH859> O God,<WH430> rejected<WH2186> us? And wilt Thou not go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> with our armies,<WH6635> O God<WH430>?
O give<WH3051> us help<WH5833> against<WH4480> the adversary,<WH6862> For deliverance<WH8668> by man<WH120> is in vain.<WH7723>
Through God<WH430> we shall do<WH6213> valiantly,<WH2428> And it is He who will tread<WH947> down<WH947> our adversaries.<WH6862>
